DOC.brief_title: The Safety Effectiveness Indinavir Plus Ritonavir Plus Two NRTIs HIV-Infected Patients Who Need Early Intervention Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: Patients receive indinavir bid plus ritonavir bid , plus 2 NRTIs bid ( 2 new NRTIs 1 new NRTI 1 NRTI without evidence resistance ) . CD4 cell count plasma viral RNA measure every 4 week duration study . Physical examination laboratory test blood urine perform every 4 week duration study . Chest x-ray 12-lead ECG do prestudy .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients may eligible study : Are HIVpositive . Are 18 year age old . Have CD4 cell count least 50 cells/mm3 . Have viral load ( level HIV blood ) least 400 copies/ml 20,000 copies/ml . Have initial response protease inhibitor therapy viral load le 400 copies/ml two consecutive test least 1 week apart . Have antiHIV ( antiretroviral ) treatment include indinavir nelfinavir least 16 week . Have virologic failure ( two consecutive viral load great equal 400 copies/ml less equal 20,000 copies/ml least 1 week apart ) due another infection , vaccination , temporary stop treatment . Are naive least one select NRTIs .
